plot: Timmy and friends want to stage a reenactment, and Timmy wants an authentic alien creature for it. Timmy's teacher, Mr. Denzel Crocker, calls for a conference with Timmy's parents for a suspicious show-and-tell project.

In "spaced out", Timmy's wish brings him a real alien. This causes its parents to come to destroy the Earth, and even magic is not working to re-unite the family. How will Timmy re-unite the alien family to save the planet? In Transparents, Timmy's teacher suspects that Timmy has Fairies and wants to talk to his "parents", in order to try and trap them. Timmy cannot tell his parents that he had a dinosaur, so he sends the C+W instead. His first problem is getting them to act human but worse: he sends his Fairies right into the trap. disaster?—N the Fan
